mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, status, costs, order_id, transporter_id, company_id, browse_status, order_no, contact_status, browse_date
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.order_no orderNo, a.status, a.costs as costs, a.browse_status as browseStatus,a.browse_date as browseDate, b.name as name,b.mobile as mobile, c.name as companyName, d.departure_province_id as departureProvinceId, d.departure_city_id as departureCityId, d.departure_area_id as departureAreaId, d.destination_province_id as destinationProvinceId, d.destination_city_id as destinationCityId, d.destination_area_id as destinationAreaId, d.car_type_id as carTypeId, a.tyre_no as tyreNo, d.car_length as carLength, a.goods_type goodsType, d.weight, d.goods_units as goodsUnits, d.deliver_date deliverDate, d.use_type_id as useTypeId, d.length, d.width, d.height, d.handling_type_id as handlingTypeId, d.payment_type_id as paymentTypeId from t_order_apply a left join t_user b on a.transporter_id = b.id left join t_company c on a.company_id = c.id left join t_order d on a.order_id = d.id where 1=1
and a.order_no like concat('%',#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and b.mobile like concat('%',#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and c.name like concat('%',#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select a.id, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.order_no orderNo, a.status, a.costs as costs, a.browse_status as browseStatus,a.browse_date as browseDate, b.name as name,b.mobile as mobile, c.name as companyName, d.departure_province_id as departureProvinceId, d.departure_city_id as departureCityId, d.departure_area_id as departureAreaId, d.destination_province_id as destinationProvinceId, d.destination_city_id as destinationCityId, d.destination_area_id as destinationAreaId, d.car_type_id as carTypeId, a.tyre_no as tyreNo, d.car_length as carLength, a.goods_type goodsType, d.weight, d.goods_units as goodsUnits, d.deliver_date deliverDate, d.use_type_id as useTypeId, d.length, d.width, d.height, d.handling_type_id as handlingTypeId, d.payment_type_id as paymentTypeId from t_order_apply a left join t_user b on a.transporter_id = b.id left join t_company c on a.company_id = c.id left join t_order d on a.order_id = d.id where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order_apply (id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, status, costs, order_id, transporter_id, company_id, browse_status, order_no, contact_status, browse_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{costs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{browseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{browseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_order_apply
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
costs = #{costs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transporter_id = #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
browse_status = #{browseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_status = #{contactStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
browse_date = #{browseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_order_apply set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, costs = #{costs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transporter_id = #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, browse_status = #{browseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_status = #{contactStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, browse_date = #{browseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
